dialogue.name: PEYRAQUILE
dialogue.text: Oh, hello again! How have you been? As for us, we've been helping Rasequin out like always. He tells us we're doing a better job with every passing day!

dialogue.name: PEYRAQUILE
dialogue.text: Speaking of which, have you been to Risensong yet? It's such a nice place─you can even hear music playing from time to time. Actually, we've been thinking how wonderful it would be if we could find work there!

dialogue.name: HWDCHILDA04003
dialogue.text: (-???-)Lycelle! My friends!

dialogue.name: LYCELLE
dialogue.text: Oh, it's you! Whatever's the matter?

dialogue.name: HWDCHILDA04003
dialogue.text: You won't believe this, but...I'm leaving the orphanage!

dialogue.name: JULCHIEZAIN
dialogue.text: So they found a new family for you!? ...I mean, hmph. Good for you, I suppose.

dialogue.name: HWDCHILDA04003
dialogue.text: Yes, I have! My new father, he's a knight, you see! And my new mother is the nicest lady you'll ever meet!

dialogue.name: HWDCHILDA04003
dialogue.text: Anyway, so Rasequin told me to come here and say...and say... Oh, I can't do it! I don't want to say good-bye to all of you!

dialogue.name: LYCELLE
dialogue.text: Oh, don't cry like that! Even after you start living with your new family, you can come and play with us whenever you want.

dialogue.name: JULCHIEZAIN
dialogue.text: That's right! And if they're ever mean to you, me and my best friend here will give them a good pounding for you!

dialogue.name: JULCHIEZAIN
dialogue.text: Isn't that right?

dialogue.name: PEYRAQUILE
dialogue.text: And how about this? For those times when you can't leave home, we'll make a memento for you so that you can remember us at any time. How would you like that?

dialogue.name: HWDCHILDA04003
dialogue.text: You...you'd really do that for me? Oh, thank you, my friends! I have to go back to the orphanage now, but I'll be waiting there until my new father comes. Be seeing you!

dialogue.name: PEYRAQUILE
dialogue.text: I just blurted that out without asking Lycelle and Julchiezain first, but they won't mind...will they?

dialogue.name: LYCELLE
dialogue.text: Peyraquile's always coming up with big and exciting ideas. It's really quite impressive!

dialogue.name: JULCHIEZAIN
dialogue.text: A memento, huh? That's such a good idea, I wish I─ I mean, I was thinking the exact same thing myself!

dialogue.name: PEYRAQUILE
dialogue.text: Yes, I'm glad you agree, but...whatever should we make them? I haven't the slightest idea...

dialogue.name: JULCHIEZAIN
dialogue.text: Good thing that I have plenty of them! For example...how about a pair of nice, fluffy gloves so he can always keep his hands warm?

dialogue.name: PEYRAQUILE
dialogue.text: Yes...that doesn't seem like it would be too difficult.

dialogue.name: JULCHIEZAIN
dialogue.text: That settles it, then! Well, I guess it's off to Marcelloix's shop for us. You don't mind coming along, do you?

dialogue.name: LYCELLE
dialogue.text: I'll check with Rasequin to see when our friend's father is coming. After all, there's no point in making a present if we're too late to give it to him.

dialogue.name: PEYRAQUILE
dialogue.text: I'll ready the tools so we can get to work right away!

dialogue.name: LYCELLE
dialogue.text: Hm? Oh, you don't have to worry about me.

dialogue.name: HWDCHILDA04003
dialogue.text: Do you know what they're making for me? Don't tell me─I want it to be a surprise!

dialogue.name: MARCELLOIX
dialogue.text: MistressMaster Forename! It's not often I see you in the company of children. Whatever is the occasion?

dialogue.name: JULCHIEZAIN
dialogue.text: Oh, there you are! Isn't Mister Marcelloix just the best?

dialogue.name: JULCHIEZAIN
dialogue.text: He may look a bit scary, but he's so nice to us─and the toys he makes are simply incredible! I'm glad I'm not one of those babies that's too frightened to talk to him.

dialogue.name: JULCHIEZAIN
dialogue.text: Hello there, Mister Marcelloix! We're in need of some yarn to knit a pair of gloves for a friend. Might you be able to spare some?

dialogue.name: MARCELLOIX
dialogue.text: Julchiezain! Always a pleasure to see you, my young friend. If it's yarn you need, it's yarn you'll get. But before that, allow me to share with you a little story.

dialogue.name: MARCELLOIX
dialogue.text: As a matter of fact, your friend Forename here is a true hero. It's thanks to herhim and Lord Francel that I have a home here in the Firmament. Did you know that?

dialogue.name: JULCHIEZAIN
dialogue.text: Really? That's amazing! You really are a hero, ladymister!

dialogue.name: MARCELLOIX
dialogue.text: Truly, I know of none who have done more to bring happiness and prosperity to the people like you. And so I am proud to bestow upon you this spindle of yarn free of charge. May it serve you and your young friends well!

dialogue.name: JULCHIEZAIN
dialogue.text: Oh, thank you, Mister Marcelloix! Till next time!

dialogue.name: MARCELLOIX
dialogue.text: I promise you that my yarn is the finest in Ishgard. May it make a warm and toasty pair of gloves for the children.

dialogue.name: JULCHIEZAIN
dialogue.text: So you're friends with Mister Marcelloix just like me! Great minds think alike, I always say!

dialogue.name: PEYRAQUILE
dialogue.text: Were you able to procure the yarn from Marcelloix's shop? I've readied everything else we need.

dialogue.name: PEYRAQUILE
dialogue.text: Wonderful! Now, all we need is to find Lycelle...

dialogue.name: LYCELLE
dialogue.text: (-Lycelle's Voice-)That won't be necessary.

dialogue.name: LYCELLE
dialogue.text: And look who I've brought with me! After all, what would make for a nicer memory than if we were to make his present right before his very eyes─don't you agree?

dialogue.name: HWDCHILDA04003
dialogue.text: They're so warm and fluffy! Oh, thank you, my friends! I'll treasure these gloves forever!

dialogue.name: REDWALD
dialogue.text: (-???-)Ah, there you are, my child.

dialogue.name: HWDCHILDA04003
dialogue.text: Oh, Mister Redwald─er...I mean...

dialogue.name: HWDCHILDA04003
dialogue.text: Welcome back...Father!

dialogue.name: REDWALD
dialogue.text: Of course, nothing would make me happier than for you to call me so, my boy. But there is no need to force yourself. After all, this is only our first of many days together.

dialogue.name: JULCHIEZAIN
dialogue.text: This is your new father? I think I might be jealous!

dialogue.name: REDWALD
dialogue.text: And you, MistressMaster Surname. I have heard much from Lord Drillemont of your selfless contributions to the restoration effort─but I did not expect to find you here in the flesh. The heavens smile upon me today, indeed.

dialogue.name: REDWALD
dialogue.text: I am pleased to report that─thanks in no small part to your efforts─the Falcon's Nest flourishes like never before. With things having settled down some, many of our soldiers and artisans have even brought their families to come reside with them.

dialogue.name: REDWALD
dialogue.text: My wife and I now live together as well, and it recently occurred to us how delightful it would be to welcome a new member of the family─a gift we sadly were not blessed with in our younger days.

dialogue.name: REDWALD
dialogue.text: I must confess, I was surprised at first to see how reluctant the boy was to leave this place. Yet seeing the warmth and camaraderie that fills this place, I now understand entirely. Rest assured that we shall do all in our power to see the boy is happy and cherished in his new home.

dialogue.name: HWDCHILDA04003
dialogue.text: Well, I suppose I'd best be off with Father here! But don't worry─I'll be back to play someday!

dialogue.name: JULCHIEZAIN
dialogue.text: ...Do you really think he'll come back to visit?

dialogue.name: JULCHIEZAIN
dialogue.text: Anyhow, I have an idea! He wasn't the first to say good-bye to this place, and he won't be the last. What if we make giving those same pair of gloves a tradition for every child who leaves the orphanage in the future?

dialogue.name: LYCELLE
dialogue.text: I had the same idea! That way, even if we all go our separate ways, it will be as if we're always together, forever!

dialogue.name: PEYRAQUILE
dialogue.text: Go our separate ways...

dialogue.name: JULCHIEZAIN
dialogue.text: Peyraquile? You don't look good. Whatever's the matter?

dialogue.name: PEYRAQUILE
dialogue.text: I...I'm sorry. I'm just a bit tired. I think I'll go lie down for a while.

dialogue.name: LYCELLE
dialogue.text: When Peyraquile goes off like that on his own, that usually means he has something on his mind. I don't want to pry, but...

dialogue.name: LYCELLE
dialogue.text: It's so cold out here, and I'm sure he's feeling lonely─even if he won't admit it. Might I ask you to check on him for us? I can't help but feel he'd find it easier to talk to you...

dialogue.name: LYCELLE
dialogue.text: He can't have gone far, so it shouldn't be hard to find him. Please? I'll follow along out of sight.

dialogue.name: JULCHIEZAIN
dialogue.text: Peyraquile's always going off to sulk on his own. I'll never understand why─aren't we his best friends, after all?

dialogue.name: LYCELLE
dialogue.text: Have you found Peyraquile yet? I'm sure he's just found himself some secluded area close by...

dialogue.name: PEYRAQUILE
dialogue.text: <sniffle> <sob>...

dialogue.name: PEYRAQUILE
dialogue.text: Forename! I-I'm not crying... It's just...s-some snow fell in my eye, and...

dialogue.name: PEYRAQUILE
dialogue.text: Oh, I'll admit it. It's just that...I love my friends here so much. When Lycelle said what she said, I couldn't help but imagine the three of us going off far away, never to see each other again...

dialogue.name: PEYRAQUILE
dialogue.text: We're the oldest here, after all. Even if they can't find families for us, we won't be able to stay here forever. More likely than not, we'll have to go off on our own...

dialogue.name: PEYRAQUILE
dialogue.text: Having to make a new life for myself in a cruel, unfamiliar world...without a family or my dear friends by my side...the thought is just too much to bear!

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: You're not alone.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: You're stronger than you give yourself credit for.

dialogue.name: LYCELLE
dialogue.text: (-Lycelle-)That's right!

dialogue.name: LYCELLE
dialogue.text: (-Lycelle-)She'sHe's right, you know! And more than that...

dialogue.name: LYCELLE
dialogue.text: We might not be related by blood, and we might not know our mothers and fathers...but we're a family, aren't we? You and me and Julchiezain!

dialogue.name: LYCELLE
dialogue.text: Why, I've thought all along that when we leave here, we could open a shop together! We could make our living crafting and building things to make people's lives better, just like we do now! What's this talk of going off by yourself somewhere!?

dialogue.name: JULCHIEZAIN
dialogue.text: That's right! Why, we can even travel to other nations and sell our goods far and wide!

dialogue.name: JULCHIEZAIN
dialogue.text: And then when we're done, we can come back here, and bring presents from around the world to the orphans! Wouldn't that be just the best?

dialogue.name: LYCELLE
dialogue.text: See? What's wrong with that kind of family? Forename here didn't end the war just so you could sulk around all alone! We have a bright future ahead of us─we need to dream big! So what do you say, Peyraquile?

dialogue.name: PEYRAQUILE
dialogue.text: Y-Yes... Yes, my friends! Oh, I would like nothing more!

dialogue.name: PEYRAQUILE
dialogue.text: Th-Thank you, Forename... I'm sorry to have worried you so.

dialogue.name: PEYRAQUILE
dialogue.text: Tell me─if we do go off traveling the world like Lycelle says, might we run into you somewhere? Truly, nothing would make me happier...

dialogue.name: PEYRAQUILE
dialogue.text: So please, keep an eye out for those gloves you helped us make─that's how you'll spot us. Safe travels, friend, till we meet again!
